Class tripleplay.util.Layers

Added Methods
Layer addChild(GroupLayer, Layer) Adds a child layer to a group and returns the child.
GroupLayer addNewGroup(GroupLayer) Adds a child group to a parent group and returns the child.
GroupLayer group(Layer[]) Creates a new group with the given children.
Connection join(Connection[]) Creates a connection that will disconnect multiple other connections.
Layer solid(int, float, float) Creates an immediate layer that renders a simple rectangle of the given color, width and height.
 

Added Fields
Connection NOT_LISTENING No-op connection, for improving nullity assumptions.
Listener NO_PROPAGATE Prevents parent handling for pointer events.
